author: Home Repair Tutor
description:
This video shares the Schluter lighted shower niche installation and what mistakes to avoid. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial. For more tips and tricks visit https://homerepairtutor.com/

#howto #diy #schlutersystems #brandpartner   

Schluter Lighted Shower Niche Installation for Beginners
0:34 How to frame a Schluter LED shower niche
2:17 How to install Schluter LIPROTEC cable
3:47 How to install electrical box for Schluter LED niche
4:47 Schluter KERDI-BOARD shower wall tips
6:36 Schluter LED Niche stainless steel connection box
7:06 How to fasten Schlute LED shower niche to wood studs
7:25 How to wire Schluter LED shower niche ECX switch
9:52 How to waterproof Schluter LED shower niche
11:05 Stainless steel cover and self-adhesive patch tips

These supplies were used in our video:

-Schluter KERDI-BOARD-SNLT Horizontal (shower niche with LIPROTEC LED lighting)
-Schluter LIPROTEC cable for LED niche (13-foot option)
-Schluter LIPROTEC-ECX (LED driver and dimmer
title: Schluter Lighted Shower Niche Installation for Beginners
